translations: v.冬眠；（人）（长期）蛰居，不活动

phrs.translation: 冬眠, 休眠, 越冬, 蛰伏
休眠模式, 冬眠模式
信息发布平台, 电子宠物案例
框架, 架构, 等开源框架

sentences.sentence: When the winter winds blow, some of us would rather hibernate than work out.
sentences.translation: 当冬天的风吹来的时候，我们中的一些人宁愿冬眠也不愿出去工作。

sentences.sentence: My current pet name for her is "bear" because she has to hibernate every night.
sentences.translation: 我现在给她的爱称是“熊熊”，因为她每天晚上都要冬眠。

sentences.sentence: Unlike squirrels, woodchucks, and many other woodland animals, bears do not actually hibernate.
sentences.translation: 与松鼠、旱獭和许多其他林地动物不同，熊实际上并不冬眠。
